brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a switch at the center of a star topology with four routers, R1, R2, R3, and R4 directly connected.

R1 says, "My priority is 0. I will not participate in the election. I am the DR other."
R2 says, "My priority is the default value of 1. I am a DR other."
R3 says, "My priority is 10. I am the DR."
R4 says, "My priority is 5, I am the BDR."
